bug.author: PointCloudNiphon
bug.summary: Epoch gpu_mem GIoU obj cls total targets img_size 0%| prediction RuntimeError: shape '[4, 3, 85, 13, 13]' is invalid for input of size 24336
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
A clear and concise description of what the bug is. when I run python train.py --cfg cfg/custom_yolo3_spp.cfg --weights weights/yolov3-spp-ultralytics.pt --data custom_data_200405/custom.data --batch-size 4 --device 0 some errors happened <denchmark-code>Namespace(accumulate=4, adam=False, arc='default', batch_size=4, bucket='', cache_images=False, cfg='cfg/yolov3-spp-7class.cfg', data='custom_data_200405/custom.data', device='0', epochs=300, evolve=False, img_size=[416], multi_scale=False, name='', nosave=False, notest=False, rect=False, resume=False, single_cls=False, var=None, weights='weights/yolov3-spp-ultralytics.pt') Using CUDA device0 _CudaDeviceProperties(name='Tesla T4', total_memory=15079MB)
Caching labels (21081 found, 0 missing, 0 empty, 0 duplicate, for 21081 images): 100%|‚ñà| 21081/21081 [00:02<00:00, 9670.57it/s Caching labels (1110 found, 0 missing, 0 empty, 0 duplicate, for 1110 images): 100%|‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà| 1110/1110 [00:00<00:00, 7458.73it/s] Model Summary: 225 layers, 6.26056e+07 parameters, 6.26056e+07 gradients Using 4 dataloader workers Starting training for 300 epochs...
Epoch gpu_mem GIoU obj cls total targets img_size 0%| | 0/5271 [00:00<?, ?it/s]Traceback (most recent call last): File "train.py", line 433, in <module> train() # train normally File "train.py", line 272, in train pred = model(imgs) File "/home/linqunshu/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 547, in __call__ result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs) File "/home/linqunshu/CODE/zp/models.py", line 298, in forward yolo_out.append(module(x, img_size)) File "/home/linqunshu/anaconda3/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 547, in __call__ result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs) File "/home/linqunshu/CODE/zp/models.py", line 207, in forward p = p.view(bs, self.na, self.no, self.ny, self.nx).permute(0, 1, 3, 4, 2).contiguous() # prediction RuntimeError: shape '[4, 3, 85, 13, 13]' is invalid for input of size 24336 0%| </denchmark-code>
where my custom data has 7 class so I modify yolov3-spp.cfg filters=36 in three yolo layer and classes=7, a magic thing is when I run python train.py --cfg cfg/yolov3-tiny-custom.cfg --weights weights/yolov3-spp-ultralytics.pt --data custom_data_200405/custom.data --batch-size 4 --device 0 it work well.... <denchmark-code>(base) linqunshu@T640:~/CODE/zp$ python train.py --cfg cfg/yolov3-tinyZP.cfg --data custom_data_200405/custom.data --batch-size 16 --device 0 --weights weights/yolov3-tiny.weights Namespace(accumulate=4, adam=False, arc='default', batch_size=16, bucket='', cache_images=False, cfg='cfg/yolov3-tinyZP.cfg',data='custom_data_200405/custom.data', device='0', epochs=300, evolve=False, img_size=[416], multi_scale=False, name='', nosave=False, notest=False, rect=False, resume=False, single_cls=False, var=None, weights='weights/yolov3-tiny.weights') Using CUDA device0 _CudaDeviceProperties(name='Tesla T4', total_memory=15079MB)
Caching labels (21081 found, 0 missing, 0 empty, 0 duplicate, for 21081 images): 100%|‚ñà| 21081/21081 [00:02<00:00, 9568.61it/s Caching labels (1110 found, 0 missing, 0 empty, 0 duplicate, for 1110 images): 100%|‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà| 1110/1110 [00:00<00:00, 8368.69it/s] Model Summary: 37 layers, 8.68374e+06 parameters, 8.68374e+06 gradients Using 8 dataloader workers Starting training for 300 epochs...
Epoch gpu_mem GIoU obj cls total targets img_size 0/299 1.91G 5.17 46.6 51.8 104 100 416: 0%| | 1/1318 [00:05<1:58:18, 5.39s/it] 0/299 1.91G 3.85 3.21 17.8 24.9 64 416: 100%|‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà| 1318/1318 [03:07<00:00, 7.01it/s] Class Images Targets P R mAP@0.5 F1: 100%|‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà| 35/35 [00:08<00:00, 3.91it/s] all 1.11e+03 5.05e+03 0.00244 0.411 0.036 0.00485
Epoch gpu_mem GIoU obj cls total targets img_size 1/299 4.75G 3.45 2.7 14.1 20.3 114 416: 80%|‚ñà‚ñà‚ñç| 1059/1318 [02:29<00:36, 7.13it/s```
</denchmark-code>

comments.comment: You need to modify all "classes=80" to "classes=7"
